front.title: The Internet Assigned Number Authority (IANA) tel Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Parameter Registry
front.abstract: This document creates an Internet Assigned Number Authority (IANA) registry for tel Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) parameters and their values. It populates the registry with the parameters defined in the tel URI specification, along with the parameters in tel URI extensions defined for number portability and trunk groups. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
